text.language: Ebolqen Mala,iac pip~rov/t/c: e~repefc~mou eyouab swpi neman a~m/n efjw m~moc:
A reading from Malachi the prophet. May his holy blessings be with us. Amen.
Pembacaan dari Kitab Maleakhi sang Nabi, kiranya berkat berkat-nya beserta kita. Amin.
من ملاخي النبي بركته المقدسة تکون معنا. آمين.
